title: Revel advertising
content:
This is driving me nuts, because I feel I should know what type this is... The B looks much like Myriad, the G like Today and the W like Metro, but I can't figure out what font combines these aspects.

[https://webspace.princeton.edu/users/klash/public/revel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106040211/https:/webspace.princeton.edu/users/klash/public/revel.jpg "https://webspace.princeton.edu/users/klash/public/revel.jpg")

I believe the mixed case at bottom is the same font as the large caps, and the second paragraph may be a narrow version of the same font.
author: Darkgreenblue

comments.content: Yup, I should have known that, as I've definitely browsed H&FJ's site. Thanks, folks.
